page.title: 10FOOTBALL CLUB,DUNVANT.
page.content: {Dunvant & Three Crosses Football Club} was founded in 1969 by parents to cater for the boys of both villages who attended the school at Three Crosses at that time.Although Dunvant now has its own school,the Club is still run for boys of both villages. Six teams are being run at present for boys up to the age of 17 and one for senior members.Apart from local league matches,tours are organised annually. In recent years the Club's younger members have formed a close friendship with the sons of American airmen based at Lakenheath in Suffolk.Reciprocal visits and hospitality are arranged culminating in matches between the teams. Five former members of the Club are now professional footballers.
